## Block.getAllDefaultPropertiesByClass() method

Get properties for all fields in display mode

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAllDefaultPropertiesByClass(field: string, clazz?: string): FieldProperties[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  field | string | The name of the field to retrieve display mode properties for. |
|  clazz | string | _(Optional)_ The class to narrow down the search. |

**Returns:**

[FieldProperties](./forms42core.fieldproperties.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of properties used in display mode for all fields with the specified class.
